tool_description: Resolve DNS addresses into IP addresses and vice versa. New method: check if a port is open on a given host.
name: DNS Tools
title: DNS Tools

api_list.name: IP2DNS
api_list.description: It returns the hostname of a given IP address.

required_parameters.name: ip
required_parameters.description: The IP address you want to resolve.

api_list.name: DNS2IP
api_list.description: It returns the IP address of a given DNS address.

required_parameters.name: dns
required_parameters.description: The DNS address you want to resolve.

api_list.name: CHKPRT
api_list.description: Check if a port is open on a remote host.

required_parameters.name: host
required_parameters.description: The DNS or IP address of the host you want to check.

required_parameters.name: port
required_parameters.description: The port you want to check if open.
